Token.Abstract: Prompt the user to update their Galileo's firmware to the latest version, if one is available.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Code block that is to be called if no update is available, if the user dismisses the update or if the phone is disconnected from the internet.
